org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet

Class ZToolAddress64

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet.ZToolAddress
      • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet.ZToolAddress64

  • public class ZToolAddress64
extends ZToolAddress
    Big Endian container for 64-bit XBee Address

    See device addressing in manual p.32

    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Andrew Rapp, Alvaro Fides Valero, Stefano Lenzi
